item.description:
Afterwork Mixer this Thursday March 8th at City Bar inside the Lenox Hotel located at Copley Square!!

For young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Back Bay neighborhood 6:15-9:30pm.

The Afterwork mixer returns this Thursday March 8th. This time we are taking the party to City Bar, a stylish lounge located inside Copley Square's Lenox Hotel. City Bar is known for having the best martinis Boston has to offer! This venue is a favorite afterwork destination for many Bostonians and Back Bay resdients alike. With spring time almost here , I encourage many of the new members who have not been able to make an event to please join the group this Thursday for a few cocktails as we gear for another festive weekend in the city! ( A warm one I hope)

Meeting Details: We will meet at the front bar , please look for me upon entering, my picture is on the left hand side of the website under the Assistant Organizer section. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND coming early as possible, with winter time in Boston this place will fill up fast!!

Also my phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving. Look forward to seeing you all there!

Steven


Public Transportation

Green Line to Copley station
Orange Line to Back Bay station

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Its March Madness!! Afterwork Mixer at City Bar Back Bay!!
